channel.title: Creating/Editing npc's
channel.description:
Hey. I have been looking through these forums for most the day and have found a lot of tutorials and people simply explaining how to edit npc's location and stats, but not their appearance.
I'm interested in finding out how to create new npc's from scratch, or at least modifying an existing npc's appearance (ie: changing the color of lesser demons from red to blue).
If anyone knows of a tutorial on this or could point me in the right direction, it would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks :)

item.title: Creating/Editing npc's
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Rsc-Live, post:3, topic:333037”]Also get familiar with Sprite editor (the same application you most likely used to change your loading/log-in screen), on top of what yong said.[/quote]Why? You really don’t need it to add/edit NPCs unless you plan on using new sprites.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating/Editing npc's
item.dc:creator: @Rsc-Live Rsc-Live
item.description:
@Rsc-Live wrote:

Also get familiar with Sprite editor (the same application you most likely used to change your loading/log-in screen), on top of what yong said.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating/Editing npc's
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Take a look at the skinColour in NPCDef.xml and NPCs.rscd.

Read full topic
